sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_58056_cat_tbl_var_catalog_table_template">
    <x_58056_cat_tbl_var_catalog_table_template action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <class_names/>
        <description>Activate this client script to properly render the '{0}' catalog table variable on non-catalog task-based records. For example, if you use a record producer to generate a change request and you include a catalog table variable on the record producer then activate this client script to have the table properly rendered on the change request form.</description>
        <element_css/>
        <element_description/>
        <element_subtype/>
        <element_type/>
        <html_template/>
        <javascript_template><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    addRenderEvent(function() {
                var rVar = '{0}';
                var ctvID = '{1}';
                if (typeof g_sc_form != 'undefined') {
                    var realName = g_sc_form.resolveNameMap(rVar);
                    var control = g_sc_form.getControl(realName);
                    if (control != undefined) {
                        ScriptLoader.getScripts('CatTblVar.jsdbx', function() {
                                    new CatTblVar(ctvID, control);
                                });
                    }
                }
            });
}]]></javascript_template>
        <label_css/>
        <name>Task Client Script</name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-01-12 01:45:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>79aa89e2db230300768670adbf9619ce</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-06-01 22:03:59</sys_updated_on>
        <template_type>script</template_type>
        <x_58056_cat_tbl_va_ui_type>both</x_58056_cat_tbl_va_ui_type>
        <xml_template/>
    </x_58056_cat_tbl_var_catalog_table_template>
</record_update>
